data.script:
<script>
    import {
        NumberInput,
        Stack,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Stack.Container
    orientation="horizontal"
    alignment_y="top"
    spacing="medium"
    variation="wrap"
>
    <NumberInput
        span_x="20"
        placeholder="This is a DEFAULT NumberInput"
    />

    <NumberInput
        shape="circle"
        span_x="20"
        placeholder="This is a CIRCLE NumberInput"
    />

    <NumberInput
        shape="pill"
        span_x="20"
        placeholder="This is a PILL NumberInput"
    />
</Stack.Container>
data.title: NumberInput Shapes
